sentence.value: Rogers was killed when the engine of his F-105 fighter plane failed near Kadena AB, Okinawa, Japan on September 13, 1967.

sentence.value: Rogers was an experimental test pilot at Edwards AFB when selected for the X-20 program in April, 1960.

sentence.value: After the X-20 program, he remained in the U.S. Air Force on active flight duty as a pilot with the rank of Lt. Colonel at the time of his death.
